languages.text: "Расплатись с прошлым кровью тех, кто предал тебя однажды. Нааки все еще в их сердцах? Так вырви их".

traits.locale_text: "Расплатись с прошлым кровью тех, кто предал тебя однажды. Нааки все еще в их сердцах? Так вырви их".

languages.text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
languages.original_text: "Расплатись с прошлым кровью тех, кто предал тебя однажды. Нааки все еще в их сердцах? Так вырви их".

traits.locale_text: "Make your past pay with the blood of those who have betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
"Make your past pay with the blood of those who have betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
"Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
"Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
"Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
"Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."

languages.text: «Lidia con el pasado derramando la sangre de quienes te traicionaron. ¿Siguen sintiendo devoción por Naaki en sus corazones? Arráncaselos».
languages.original_text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."

traits.locale_text: «Lidia con el pasado derramando la sangre de quienes te traicionaron. ¿Siguen sintiendo devoción por Naaki en sus corazones? Arráncaselos».

languages.text: 「裏切り者の血を流すことで、過去と決別するんだ。彼らはまだナアキを忘れられないのか？ならば、引き裂いてしまえ」
languages.original_text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."

traits.locale_text: 「裏切り者の血を流すことで、過去と決別するんだ。彼らはまだナアキを忘れられないのか？ならば、引き裂いてしまえ」

languages.text: “要铭记过去，要让那些背叛你的人血债血偿。那些人还把拿基放在心上吗？既然如此，就把他们的心挖出来吧。”
languages.original_text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."

traits.locale_text: “要铭记过去，要让那些背叛你的人血债血偿。那些人还把拿基放在心上吗？既然如此，就把他们的心挖出来吧。”

languages.text: "Mit der Vergangenheit rechnet Ihr ab, indem Ihr das Blut jener vergießt, die Euch hintergangen haben. Halten sie Naaki immer noch in ihren Herzen? Dann reißt ihnen diese heraus."
languages.original_text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."

traits.locale_text: "Mit der Vergangenheit rechnet Ihr ab, indem Ihr das Blut jener vergießt, die Euch hintergangen haben. Halten sie Naaki immer noch in ihren Herzen? Dann reißt ihnen diese heraus."

languages.text: « Réglez vos comptes passés en versant le sang des traîtres qui vous ont fait défaut. Et s'ils portent encore Naaki dans leur cœur, arrachez-le-leur. »
languages.original_text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."

traits.locale_text: « Réglez vos comptes passés en versant le sang des traîtres qui vous ont fait défaut. Et s'ils portent encore Naaki dans leur cœur, arrachez-le-leur. »

languages.text: "Sana ihanet edenlerin kanını dökerek geçmişinle hesaplaş. Yüreklerinde hâlâ Naaki'nin yeri var mı? O hâlde yüreklerini sök."
languages.original_text: "Reckon with the past by spilling the blood of those who betrayed you. Do they still hold Naaki in their hearts? Then tear them out."
